landingPage.intro: Take your gaming communication to the next level with Sonoran  Radio. Chat in       realistic radio channels, customize your voice effects, and connect effortlessly with in-game features for a truly  immersive experience.

Dispatch_Panel.title: Dispatch Panel
Dispatch_Panel.desc1: Easily visualize, manage users, play tones, and more!
Dispatch_Panel.desc2: Sonoran Radios dispatch UI is available everywhere on the web and desktop for Windows and OSX.

Cloud_Configurations.title: Cloud Configurations
Cloud_Configurations.desc: Customizing your radio has never been easier, with live updates from our easy-to-use configuration panel.

Custom_Voice_Effects.title: Custom Voice Effects
Custom_Voice_Effects.desc: Customize digital and analog style voice effects for your community!

Customizable_SFX.title: Customizable SFX
Customizable_SFX.desc: Configure signal loss in tunnels, underground locations, and more!

ToneBoard.title: Toneboard
ToneBoard.desc1: Upload and customize dispatch tones for your community!
ToneBoard.desc2: Sonoran Radios dispatch UI allows you to specify specific channels and groups, repeat tones, and more! You can even play tones on in-game speakers!

Transmission_Logs.title: Transmission Logs
Transmission_Logs.desc: View and playback transmission logs with optional AI-powered text transcriptions!

Destructible_towers.title: Destructible Towers
Destructible_towers.desc1: The physical in-game towers are able to be destroyed by criminals, which will devastate quality of radios around it.
Destructible_towers.desc2: With three different in-game model types, Sonoran Radio takes immersion to the next level!

Radio_Chattrer.title: Hear Nearby Radio Chatter
Radio_Chattrer.desc: Pulled over in a traffic stop? You will hear the real radio chatter when an officer has an active radio nearby!

VehicleDisplay.title: Vehicle Display
VehicleDisplay.desc: Our 3D vehicle radio display reflects your channel information, transmitting user, and panic status in real time bringing new levels of immersion!

inGameToneBoard.title: Tone Board to In-Game Speakers
inGameToneBoard.desc: Sonoran Radios dispatch UI allows you to specify specific channels and groups, repeat tones, and more! You can even play tones on in-game speakers!

EmergencyCalls.title: In-Game Emergency Calls
EmergencyCalls.desc: Make emergency calls to dispatch, all from in-game!

Scanners.title: Scanners
Scanners.desc: In-game scanners allow you and others nearby to listen in on radio traffic!

BackgroundAudio.title: Background Audio
BackgroundAudio.desc: Responding to a call? Sonoran Radio injects real-time sirens, gunshots, and more directly into your microphone feed for the ultimate immersion.

tunnelSignalLoss.title: Tunnel Signal Loss
tunnelSignalLoss.desc: Configure signal loss in tunnels, underground locations, and more!

MultipleRadioOperations.title: Multiple Radio Options
MultipleRadioOperations.desc1: Sonoran Radio offers multiple in-game user interfaces, allowing you to stay connected on-foot, in-vehicle, and more!
MultipleRadioOperations.desc2: Choose from one of our radio style options, or even add your own!

Sonoran_CAD.title: Sonoran CAD
Sonoran_CAD.desc: This plugin allows Sonoran Radio customers to connect the radio with the Sonoran CAD. View your unit status, dispatch call information, toggle a panic, and more!

Sonoran_CMS.title: Sonoran CMS
Sonoran_CMS.desc: Automate Sonoran Radio permissions with Sonoran CMS!

bigDaddyRadio.title: Big-Daddy Radio Animations
bigDaddyRadio.desc: Sonoran Radio is partnered with Big Daddy Scripts to offer a FREE copy of their radio animations script!

mobileCommandCenter.title: Mobile Command Center
mobileCommandCenter.desc: Sonorans mobile command center enables you to take command like never before. This one-of-a-kind utility vehicle brings endless possibilities!

Power_Grid.title: Power Grid
Power_Grid.desc: Hack into the integrated power grid to disable Sonoran Radio towers in your area! Learn more about this script!

splash.marketExplain:
In public safety, simplicity and reliability are essential when choosing
      a communication system. Sonoran Radio provides the most comprehensive
      and all-inclusive communication system on the market today. This new
      radio system has cutting-edge technology, providing both simplex and
      duplex configurations, cloud based programming, and a scalable,
      repeater-driven radio network.
splash.feats:
Complete with inter-personnel text messaging and Sonoran CAD
      integration, Sonoran Radio puts fully-featured communications devices
      directly in the hands of your in-game personnel and dispatchers. Try it
      for free today!

misc.learnMoreAboutRadio: Learn more about how Sonoran Radio can revolutionize your roleplay!

misc.noLocalStorageSupport: Your browser doesn't support local storage or it may be disabled.

signup.passwordNoUppercase: Password doesn't contain any uppercase characters
signup.usernameNotLongEnough: Username is not more than 4 characters long.
signup.invalidEmail: Email specified is not a valid email address, please use another email address.

login.forgotPasswordDesc: Forgot your Sonoran account password? Enter your email below to reset your credentials.

signup.emailPreferencesDesc: Email me important announcements, updates, and promotions.
signup.checkEmail: Check your email and verify your account.
signup.checkSpam: Make sure to check your spam folder if you cannot locate the email.

serverCommon.nicknameInputDesc: Set a custom nickname for your community, which you and your members will see
serverCommon.serverUidInputDesc: Enter your TeamSpeak 3 server's UID here

registerServer.registerATSServerDesc: Register your TeamSpeak Server to allow your server to be able to use the Sonoran Radio TeamSpeak plugin.
registerServer.registerAStandServerDesc: Register your community to use Sonoran Radio.
registerServer.errExists: TeamSpeak Server UID provided already exists on a verified server, please use another TS server UID
registerServer.errUnknown: An error occurred while trying to get server information, please try again later.

toneBoard.title: Tone Board
toneBoard.subtitle: Customize dispatch tones for your community

settingsDialog.title: Settings
settingsDialog.changingOutputsUnsupported: Your device doesn't support changing audio outputs
settingsDialog.macosPermWarning: Your device may require additional permissions: {link}
settingsDialog.webHotkeyWarning:
Hotkeys only work when the browser window is focused.
{link} for global hotkeys
settingsDialog.escapeModeKeepTooltip: The radio stays visible on ESC
settingsDialog.escapeModeXmitTooltip: The radio closes on ESC, but is visible when transmitting

authMember.title: You are Waiting for Approval
authMember.subtitle: Before being able to use Sonoran Radio for {serverName}, you must be approved by the server owner or community administrator. Please wait for approval.
authMember.subtitleShort: Before using Sonoran Radio in this community, you must be approved by community staff
authMember.leaveMsg: Are you sure you want to leave this Sonoran Radio Community?
authMember.errLeave: An unexpected error occurred while leaving the community.

authServer.title: Authenticate your TeamSpeak Server
authServer.subtitle: Authenticate your TeamSpeak server through an easy authentication process utilizing the Sonoran Radio plugin and web panel. During this authentication process individuals in your TeamSpeak server that have adequate permissions will be shown a popup stating your pending authorization, please enter the authorization code below into the TeamSpeak popup window to authorize. If you accidentally set your TeamSpeak server UID to incorrectly, you can change it below. If you're not seeing the TeamSpeak popup from Sonoran Radio, please verify you've inputted the correct UID and you have atleast v0.2.0 of the plugin installed. Otherwise, contact support.
authServer.copiedCode: Copied server authentication code to clipboard
authServer.errSave: An unexpected error occurred while saving the server.
authServer.errDelete: An unexpected error occurred while deleteing the server.

manageServer.explainOwnerOnly: Only the owner can change this setting
manageServer.noPermPage: You do not have permission to view this page

settings.title: Default Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure the default settings for your community. Users can personalize their own preferences, but these will serve as the starting defaults.
settings.agcDesc: Automatically adjust the microphone input volume to equalize the volume of all users.
settings.hearPttSfxDesc: Play the PTT sound when you key up your microphone.
settings.hearOtherPttSfxDesc: Play the PTT sound when other users key up their microphone.
settings.muteScannedWhileTransmittingDesc: Mute scanned channels while transmitting on a channel.
settings.sirenVolumeDesc: When in-game siren is activated, add/subtract to the volume.
settings.ttsDesc: Play a text-to-speech voice of the channel name when you change channels.
settings.keyUpDelayDesc: Delay after ending a transmission before the mic is released.
settings.volChangeDesc: Volume change % when using the volume up/down hotkeys.

importSAPR.jsonMsg: Paste your SAPR config JSON here
importSAPR.confirmMsg: You are about to import {n} channels. Are you sure?

manageServer.unauthorizeMsg: Are you sure you want to unauthorize this configuration?
manageServer.deleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration? This will result in irreversable data loss.

patrolChannels.title: Patrol Channels
patrolChannels.subtitle: Patrol Channels are the TeamSpeak channels that are whitelisted to use the Sonoran Radio TeamSpeak plugin functionality.
patrolChannels.explainDisabled: Patrol Channel is disabled due to downgrading to a lower plan, you must remove other patrol channels before you can re-enable this one.
patrolChannels.explainDisabledCanReenable: Patrol Channel is disabled due to downgrading to a lower plan, but you can re-enable in the dropdown menu!
patrolChannels.dialogSubtitle: A Patrol Channel is the TeamSpeak channel that is whitelisted to use the Sonoran Radio TeamSpeak plugin functionality. Here you'll set the TeamSpeak channel ID and set whether or not the "Patrol Channel" should allow talkover.
patrolChannels.legacyChannelUidWarn: This form of Channel ID has been deprecated. Please upgrade to the latest version of Sonoran Radio TS and update to new numerical IDs
patrolChannels.errSave: An unexpected error occurred while saving the patrol channel.
patrolChannels.errReenable: An unexpected error occurred while enabling the patrol channel.
patrolChannels.errDelete: An unexpected error occurred while deleting the patrol channel.

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.subtitle: Profiles are the preset frequency settings to allow for an easy transition between specific frequencies without the need to manually type in each frequency.
profiles.explainDisabled: Profile is disabled due to downgrading to a lower plan, you must remove other profiles before you can re-enable this one.
profiles.explainDisabledCanReenable: Profile is disabled due to downgrading to a lower plan, but you can re-enable this profile in the dropdown menu!
profiles.dialogSubtitle: A Profile is a preset frequency setting to allow for an easy transition between specific frequencies without the need to manually type in each frequency. Here you'll set the Display Name (optional), Receiver Frequency (required), Transmit Frequency (optional), and whether or not the Transmit Frequency will repeat.
profiles.errSave: An unexpected error occurred while saving the profile.
profiles.errDelete: An unexpected error occurred while deleting the profile.
profiles.errSetDefault: An unexpected error occurred while setting the default profile.
profiles.errReenable: An unexpected error occurred while re-enabling the profile.

micClick.subheader: Customize the sound effects for your entire community.
micClick.simulatedAudioSubtitle: Background audio injection blends in-game sounds—like sirens, helicopter rotors, boat engines, and gunshots—into your microphone output.

voiceCustomization.subheader: Customize the radio voice effects for your community.

perms.title: Permissions
perms.subtitle: Permissions allow you to change how users interact with the Sonoran Radio plugin, and what they can interact with.
perms.dialogSubtitle: Gives a server group a specific permission in Sonoran Radio. To learn more about permissions and how to get server groups, please see the Sonoran Radio Documentation.
perms.invalidGroupId: Invalid Server Group, it must be a number.

dispatch::open.name: Open Dispatch UI
dispatch::open.desc: This permission grants the ability to open the Dispatch UI

dispatch::ext_commands.name: Modify Channel User
dispatch::ext_commands.desc: This permission grants the ability to change channel users' frequencies and nicknames through the Dispatch UI

tg::talkover_override.name: Talkover Protection Override
tg::talkover_override.desc: This permission grants the ability to double-click your PTT button to talk over another client

menu::radio_lock.name: Radio Lock
menu::radio_lock.desc: This permissions allows you to halt another person's tranmission if they're already transmitting

menu::radio_attn.name: Radio Attention
menu::radio_attn.desc: This permissions grants you the ability to play a sound on another user's radio to grab their attention

perms.errSave: An unexpected error occurred while saving the permission.
perms.errDelete: An unexpected error occurred while deleting the permission.

myself.title: Your Community Info
myself.subtitle: View and edit your community settings

members.title: Community Members
members.subtitle: Manage user permissions and access in your community.
members.explainDisabled: Only server owners can add or modify managers
members.removeWarnSubHolderMsg: Removing the subscription holder will downgrade this server to free! Are you sure you want to continue?
members.removeWarnSelfMsg: Are you sure you want to remove yourself from this server? You will lose access and the server owner will have to add you back.
members.errAddInvalidAccount: The username provided does not exist
members.errAddUnknown: An unknown error occurred while adding the manager
members.errRemoveUnknown: An unknown error occurred while removing the manager

manageServer.errServerCheck: An unexpected error occurred while checking your server.
manageServer.errUidTaken: The TeamSpeak server UID is already in use by another authorized server.
manageServer.errSaveInfo: An unexpected error occurred while saving your server info.
manageServer.errImport: An unexpected error occurred while importing your SAPR Config.
manageServer.errImportNotFound: No SAPR configuration was found for your TeamSpeak UID.
manageServer.errUnauthorize: An unexpected error occurred while unauthorizing your server.

portal.title: Sonoran Radio Portal
portal.subtitle: Welcome to the base of operations! Here you can edit subscriptions in          the Billing Portal, manage community settings with the easy          Configuration Panel, or register a brand new server with our setup          wizard.
portal.discoveryHighTraffic: This community is receiving high website traffic
portal.discoveryActiveMembers: This community has some of the most active members
portal.needACommunity: Need a new Sonoran Radio community?

billing.isUnauthorized: Subscriptions cannot be applied to unauthorized servers

newSubDialog.title: New Subscription
newSubDialog.noServerDesc: This subscription will not be associated with a community. You will be able to change it later.
newSubDialog.errCreate: An unexpected error occurred while creating the subscription

changeSvDialog.title: Update Subscription
changeSvDialog.subtitle: Choose a Server
changeSvDialog.errSave: An unexpected error occurred while changing the subscription

confirmChangeSub.title: Change Subscription
confirmChangeSub.remove: Are you sure you want to remove this server from your subscription?
confirmChangeSub.transfer: Are you sure you want to transfer this subscriptiont to another server?
confirmChangeSub.set: Are you sure you want to set this server for your subscription?
confirmChangeSub.possibleDataLoss: If transferring or removing your subscription, loss of data on the previous server may occur.

billing.errCheck: An unexpected error occurred while checking your subscription

account.tokenDesc: Copy this token to use for logging in with the FiveM radio!
account.tokenDescWarning: This code is SECRET and should not be shared with anyone!
account.tokenCopied: The secret is copied to your clipboard!
account.serversDesc: Here you can view all Sonoran Radio communities you own or manage

pricing.description: Sonoran Radio's paid subscriptions grant you access to advanced features, customization, increased limits, and more!
pricing.monthCostDescription: The cost of our monthly subscription package.
pricing.patrolChannelsDescription: # of TeamSpeak channels where the radio plugin can be used.
pricing.talkaroundFrequenciesDescription: Talkaround frequencies allow individuals to talk radio to radio instead of radio to tower.
pricing.talkoverProtectionDescription: Talkover protection allows only one individual to talk over a frequency at a time.
pricing.dispatchPanelDescription: The TeamSpeak dialog that lets you change the settings of your radio or the radios of others.
pricing.fivemRadioDescription: The FiveM handheld radio allows you to change your frequencies, scan list, and other radio settings
pricing.fivemTowersDescription: Towers simulate reception to a physical tower, based on your distance. Locations and ranges are customizable.
pricing.fivemTowerDestructionDescription: The (optional) ability for players to destroy physical towers to hurt radio reception.
pricing.onlySelfFrequencies: Only allowed to change your own frequencies
